name: Group Velocity Dispersion Curves Measured in Southwestern Canada
description: We use the frequency-time analysis with a phase-matched filter (Levshin & Ritzwoller, 2001) to measure Rayleigh and Love wave group velocity dispersion curves between 8 and 25 s for the ambient noise cross-correlation of each station pair in southwestern Canada, the Cordillera-Craton transition region in particular. In this data set, there are two Python pickle files, one is for the vertical-vertical (Z-Z) component, and the other is for the transverse-transverse (T-T) component. For any questions, please contact: Jingchuan Wang (jingchuan@ualberta.ca)
